Data.IntroductionDescription: Jackpot 1 in Tivoli has 191 slot machines, and is the biggest slot machine arcade in Denmark.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondaryHeadline: The biggest gambling arcade in the country
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Age limit: 18 years + Opening hours: Follow Tivoli's opening hours. (Outside the season 11.00 am â€“ 11.00 pm all days)
Data.PageManchet: Please note: Due to the Danish Health Authority's latest COVID-19 restrictions Jackpot 1 is closed.
Data.PageText:
Jackpot 1 in Tivoli has 191 slot machines, and is the biggest slot machine arcade in Denmark. This is where you can try anything from the Orient Express, Apache, Olfert and Allan Capone to Thor's Hammer and Miss Fortuna.

The gaming hall is open all year round from the entrance in Tietgensgade 28, and during Tivoli's seasons you can also enter from the Gardens.

The gaming hall has a Jackpot club, where our guests can save up points when they come. These points can later be exchanged for Tivoli products.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Jackpot 3 is a cosy little amusement arcade with its entrance in Smøgen.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary:
Age limit: 18 years
Opening hours: follows park opening hours
Data.PageManchet: Please note: Due to the Danish Health Authority's latest COVID-19 restrictions Jackpot 3 is closed.
Data.PageText:
Jackpot 3 is a cosy little amusement arcade with its entrance in Smøgen (the Alley). This is where you will find classic slot machines like Mount Everest and Olfert beside newer touch-screen machines like Starfighter and Rally.

Free coffee, tea and cocoa are served by friendly waiters in the gaming hall, to give you a great gaming experience.

This gaming hall is part of the Jackpot club, where our guests can save up points when they come. These points can later be exchanged in Jackpot 1 for Tivoli products.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Fly the giant eagles and feel the power of up to 4G!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Experience the world upside down!
Data.PageManchet: Experience the world upside down!
Data.PageText:
Aquila is also the name of the constellation of the Eagle, which famous Danish astronomer Tycho Brahe observed in the late 1500's. The ride is a neck-breaking experience! Step aboard the giant eagles, and feel the centrifugal forces of 4G being unleashed.

From 11 meters height you will see the world upside down. All your emotions will be tested - from thrills and laughs to squeals!

Do you dare ...?

Data.PageText: The Classic Carousel is probably one of the rides that most people look back on as one of their earliest Tivoli memories. You can choose between tall or low animals, so all ages love it – and you never grow too old for a ride on a giraffe or an elephant!

Data.IntroductionDescription: The Demon is without a doubt the ride that causes the most screams of excitement in the whole of the Gardens. This  wild ride features three amazing loops and reaches 28 metres at it's highest point.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondaryHeadline: Do you dare try The Demon?
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: An adrenalin rush that lasts several minutes.
Data.PageManchet: An adrenalin rush that lasts several minutes.
Data.PageText:
The Demon is without a doubt the ride that causes the most screams of excitement in the whole of the Gardens. This wild ride features three amazing loops and reaches 28 metres at it's highest point.

Don't forget a big smile when you ride in the Demon – a photo will be taken on this ride!

Price per photo 60 DKK. Take two for 100 DKK.

 If you have an Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus, you can get unlimited digital ride photos from the Demon on your mobile through Tivoli's app. More info.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Fatamorgana is a 45 meter tall tower, that combines three rides in one. Therefore there is a ride for every member of the family!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: A 45 meter tall tower with a 3-in-1 ride
Data.PageManchet: A 45 meter tall tower with a 3-in-1 ride
Data.PageText:
Fatamorgana is a 45 meter tall tower. It combines three rides in one so there will be something for every member of the family. The 5-years-olds can enjoy a mini version of The Bumper Cars at the ground level, and on the next level a combi-ride will have a wild and a less wild version. 

A great ride for the little ones
Fatamorgana is the first theme ride in Denmark to contain 3-in-1. At the bottom of the ride you'll find mini bumper cars for children aged 5 years and up. The cars are designed to look like rabbits and jackals, so the hunt can get started!

A proper rush to the stomach
On the next floor of we have established a ride that combines both a wild and a semi-wild experience. In the fast version the guests are seated in a ring with their back towards the center and slung around while being propelled to 2,5 G-force. At the same time the whole structure with the four arms rotates around the tower. The ride is floorless, adding to the extremity of the whole experience. Definitely not for the faint hearted but only the most hardened speed fan!

A softer version 
In the smaller version of the wild Fatamorgana guests are seated two in each gondola, one behind the other. The gondolas are designed to resemble wild animals. The experience will be at a more moderate pace, so there's more time to enjoy the great view.

Health restrictions:
Please be aware that there might be health restrictions on this ride. Find more information at each ride.

Data.PageText: Rasmus Klump's World is where you will find the world's first Rasmus Klump ride, the Lighthouse. The ride has six boats shaped like prehistoric animals, designed for children who like a bit of a thrill, but don't want it to get too wild.

The canon balls whistle past your ears when the Pirate Captain and his crew try to save their ship from being captured. Ahoy there!

Please note. The Galley Ships are closed during Winter in Tivoli.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Enjoy the impressive 360-degree panorama view from the Star Flyer – that is, if you dare to take a peak?
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: An impressive 360-degree panorama view â€“ that is, if you dare to look.
Data.PageManchet: With an impressive height of 80 metres, the Star Flyer can call itself one of the highest carousel in Northern Europe. Dare you let yourself go on it?
Data.PageText:
The Star Flyer is a combination of a high-view attraction and a classic swing-carousel, with both the thrill of excitement and the sensation of flying.

The ride is themed, featuring Tycho Brahe's universe with planets, quadrants, zodiacal armillaries, telescopes and astronomical symbols. In the evenings the Star Flyer is illuminated, and forms a visual attraction together with the rest of the illuminations in the Gardens.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Go prospecting for diamonds in the Mine! A fantastic journey through the land of the Grotes, guarded by the friendly dragon.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Shoot at the diamonds and score points!
Data.PageManchet: A fantastic journey through the land of the Grotes, guarded by the dragon, Mistress Mother-of-Pearl.
Data.PageText:
It's dark and clammy. But there is no going back. Your journey through the land of the Grotes has begun! Watch out for the dragon! Make sure you don't lean back on your journey through the Mine! You must take care not to get wet - and watch out for the dragon! It is not easy, because you’ll encounter curious creatures and glittering diamonds along the way too. So be ready for anything! Especially the detector, so you can score the most points.

Don't forget a big smile when you go down the Mine where a photo will be taken on this ride!

Price: 1 x DKK 60, 2 x DKK 100.

If you have an Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus, you can get unlimited digital ride photos from the Mine on your mobile through Tivoli's app. Read more.

Covid-19:
The Danish authorities have approved that the Mine can run with increased capacity when adhering to certain health guidelines. Therefore face masks must be worn in the line and on the ride.

Please note: The Mine is temporarily closed.

Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Speed, fun and a lot of chasing.
Data.PageManchet: In the Bumper Cars you can charge about having lots of fun.

The Bumper Cars have been given a new theme design, the antennas have been scrapped and the 18 new cars move around on 280 m2 of space. The new cars are a hybrid between cars and wild buffalo, to ensure you get speed, pace and fun united in one and the same experience.

The scenography is inspired by the American art-deco style of the 1920s, and by one of the most famous cowboys from the Wild West, Buffalo Bill.

The little ones love being in control of the old cars. Deep in concentration and with a quick smile for the camera, they are off to show you what they can do. "... My red car runs so well, there's no petrol, there's no smell. Brum, brum, brum, brum, brum...

It is also possible to have a photo taken during the Vintage Cars ride.
Price: 1 x DKK 60, 2 x DKK 100.

 If you have an Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus, you can get unlimited digital ride photos from the Vintage Cars on your mobile througt Tivoli's app. Read more.

Data.AccessPrice: 2 tickets of DKK 30 or Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus
Data.AccessNotes: Children aged under 12 years are only admitted with a paying companion (minimum 18 years).
Data.IntroductionDescription: The secrets of the haunted villa are not to be revealed here.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Do you dare enter?
Data.PageManchet: The secrets of the haunted villa are not to be revealed here.
Data.PageText:
Underneath the Tivoli Castle lies the haunted Villa Vendetta. The story goes that many years ago a noble family lived here. After years of working in the gardens the family was forgotten. Now no one remembers who they were, but decades of oblivion have made them resentful and bitter, turning them into lunatics that best be avoided.

As a guest in their villa, you'll be invited for a walk through the haunted rooms, where you finally end up in the sinister basement whose secrets are not to be revealed here.

Entrance to Villa Vendetta is 60 DKK and is not included in the Unlimited Ride Ticket. If you upgrade your Unlimited Ride Ticket to an Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus, you can take the tour as many times as you want!

Please note: Strobe lights and flashing lights in use.

See opening hours below.

Data.IntroductionDescription: This is where you find Tivoli's largest range of lollipops. They are handmade using the old recipes, which bring out the best when it comes to taste and colour. Come and see our wide range in all sizes and colours - an experience for all the senses.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Impressive lollipops and sweets.
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{B8C479F7-B4CD-47AF-95D2-54A55FE2AF60}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Arkadens Isbod" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: Impressive lollipops and sweets.
Data.PageText:
This is where you find Tivoli's largest range of lollipops. They are handmade using the old recipes, which bring out the best when it comes to taste and colour. Come and see our wide range in all sizes and colours - an experience for all the senses.

Due to the restrictions imposed by the authorities, we kindly ask those of our guests who are enjoying food in Tivoli to remember to observe the obligation to wear face masks at cafés, restaurants and bars. This means that you must wear a face mask whenever you are walking or standing still in a restaurant, café or bar, or in the Tivoli Food Hall. You are allowed to not wear a face mask while you are sitting down. 
At Tivoli, we do all that we can to ensure a safe experience in the Gardens and at our restaurants and food stands. Further information on the measures we are taking is available here.
If you haven't brought a face mask, you can buy one at one of several places in Tivoli, for example at the Box Office or in Little Tivoli.

Data.IntroductionDescription: The Danish microbrewery Anarkist has arrived in Tivoli Gardens
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Craft beer and pizza all year round in Tivoli Gardens.
Data.PageManchet: Unique beers, micro brewed.
Data.PageText:
Tivoli is proud to present our brand new beer pub, ANARKIST BAR. We feel that it firmly stands out from the rest of the Copenhagen beer bars with its style. Both when it comes to its own ANARKIST beer from the micro brewery in Odense and in the sleek, Nordic designed premises in Tivoli.

ANARKIST is well known among beer afficionados that appreciate the unique beers from the micro brewery. Try sampling the fruity and unfiltered Hazy IPA, the fresh fruit bomb, Bloody Weizen, and Naked Gold, a pure and malted, crispy lager. There are many different flavors and varieties to choose from at ANARKIST BAR, as well as a huge selection of specially picked beers from home and abroad on tap and bottle.

The menu features delicious, crispy pizzas. Both for meat lovers and vegetarians.

ANARKIST BAR is open for lunch and dinner, daily from 12. Entrance from Bernstorffsgade and from inside the gardens.

Open all year from 12-24. Snacks and vegetarian. Can be booked for larger and smaller events.

menu

Data.IntroductionDescription: Time for an ice cream? At Bazar Isen you can get delicious soft ices and scoops in lots of different flavors.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Well-stocked ice cream parlour
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{CDAE7154-5480-4AC9-A1F6-0A00E306F6BF}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Bazar isen" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: Time for an ice cream?
Data.PageText: Time for an ice cream? At Bazar Isen you can get delicious soft ices and scoops in lots of different flavours.

Data.IntroductionDescription: A Hereford Beefstouw serves tender and well cooked Australian and South American beef, New Zealand lamb and fish cooked on the open grill.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: One of Copenhagen's oldest steakhouses.
Data.PageManchet: One of Copenhagen's oldest steakhouses.
Data.PageText:
At A Hereford Beefstouw, you can choose accompaniments for your steak from the large salad bar that offers fresh, crisp vegetables, home-made dressings and delicious specialities. The restaurant has a large selection of cold drinks and home-brewed beer from the Apollo Brewery and its own soft drinks. The wine list should not be missed either; it boasts the finest wines from around the world.

In summer you can enjoy your meal on the large, open terrace overlooking the beautiful Gardens.

Opening hours: 12.00 - 22.00.

Special conditions: We offer gluten free bread.

Data.IntroductionDescription: The most delicious American ice cream mixtures.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Go ahead - Try one!
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{9B6FA619-D696-4D8D-9922-C866199A4153}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Ben og Jerrys" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: Go ahead - Try one!
Data.PageText: The most delicious American ice cream blends.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Enjoy a frothy, cold draught beer in cosy and unpretentious surroundings served by young waitresses and waiters wearing Heidi dresses and lederhosen. You can also sample bratwurst, sauerkraut and other delicious German specialities.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Traditional Bierstube with a good selection of the best German beers.
Data.PageSubtitle: Authentic German/Alpine atmosphere; quality beer; informal surroundings.
Data.PageManchet: Traditional Bierstube with a good selection of the best German beers.
Data.PageText:
In the chalet, which is the largest room and holds up to 100 guests, we guarantee genuine après ski atmosphere. The staff wears Heidi dresses or Lederhosen and every pint is well-poured, the atmosphere is right, and the music is rolling along to - a singalong at the long tables.

In the hunting cabin next door we present more exclusive surroundings. Up to 50 guests can recline in the soft leather chairs in front of the fireplace and enjoy the more relaxed sporting/hunting mood. The hunting cabin is also ideal for special events for smaller companies.

We accept reservations for 10 persons and more. Smaller parties cannot make a reservation. Please note that all parties must preorder the menu. No table reservation for drinks only.

Opening hours:

Sunday-Thursday 12-22
Friday & Saturday 12-23

menu   Drinks menu

Data.IntroductionDescription: Traditional Danish sweets, made using recipes from Almuegaarden.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Danish delicacies..
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{8784D419-CBCA-438B-B6F9-CB49EF7D5D5B}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Bolchekogeriet" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: Traditional Danish sweets, made from original recipes.
Data.PageText:
Sweets, lollipops and much more. 

Special conditions: We offer sugar free varieties.

Please note: Bolchekogeriet is closed during Winter in Tivoli!

Data.IntroductionDescription: Brdr. Price at Tivoli celebrates the art of Danish cuisine: "Food like grandma made" when she really had time for it - with butter, of course! The specials board follows the seasons and the Ã  la carte menu changes during the summer.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: A selection of the best of Danish cuisine, interpreted by the two food-loving brothers, Adam and James.
Data.PageManchet: A selection of the best of Danish cuisine.
Data.PageText:
Put another way, Brdr. Price serves "Food like grandma made it" when she really had time for it, with butter of course. You can follow Brdr. Price's menu and á la carte on the board outside the restaurant, which changes during the seasons.

In the light rooms at Glassalen (the Glass Hall Theatre), which formerly housed the Michelin restaurant The Paul, posters and photos from the Price family's theatre history hang from the walls.

Did you know that the Price family established itself in Copenhagen at the beginning of the 1800s, and that individual family members helped to start up Pantomimeteatret (the Pantomime Theatre) at Tivoli?

Data.IntroductionDescription: It was here at the Apollo brewery that the Danish beer revolution started in 1990. Apollo serves its own home-brewed draft beer and classics from the menu.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: The oldest microbrewery in Copenhagen set in the heart of the city.
Data.PageManchet: The oldest microbrewery in Copenhagen set in the heart of the city.
Data.PageText:
It was here at the Apollo brewery, Denmark's first microbrewery in recent times, that the Danish beer revolution started in 1990.

Apollo serves its own home-brewed beer and you will also find 3-4 different types of beer here. For example, enjoy the beer of the month in the brewery's rustic and cosy environment.

The brewery's menu offers classics such as roast rump steak, juicy ribs, cockerel breast and pan-fried scampi. The delicate, home-brewed schnapps, made of beer (at Apollo's sister brewery in Herning) really must be tasted when you take a table at the Apollo.

You can also buy beer to take home!

Data.IntroductionDescription: A classic Danish pastry shop with an enchanting French twist. Tivoli's pastry shop is a genuine wonderland for the sweet tooth, featuring a wide variety of delicate cakes and bubbling champagne.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: A genuine wonderland for the sweet tooth.
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{6E792300-BCFB-4FDE-8CDD-4869FC2B6CF1}" querystring="" target="" text="Read more" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Cakenhagen" linktype="internal" />
Data.PageManchet: A genuine wonderland for the sweet tooth.
Data.PageText: A classic Danish pastry shop with an enchanting French twist. Tivoli's pastry shop is a genuine wonderland for the sweet tooth, featuring a wide variety of delicate cakes and bubbling champagne.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Enjoy a cup of freshly picked tea at Chaplon Tea, the only retailer in Northern Europe. The people behind Chaplon Tea seek out small local tea gardens across Asia and buy small productions, actually intended for the discerning and quality-conscious home.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Freshly picked tea that you can enjoy in the white chairs by the fountain at Springvandet.
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{F9B73135-D00E-4322-8177-C3A4104201D2}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Chaplon Tesalon" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: Chaplon Tesalon is Northern Europe's only distributor of freshly picked tea.
Data.PageText: At Chaplon Tesalon you can enjoy some of the world's best teas and experience the refined world of tea drinking. Try the summery fruit teas from our own plantation in Sri Lanka or some of our exclusive specialty teas.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Churroria is decorated Spanish-style, with seating where you can enjoy your drinks and churros. Churros are also called "Spanish tubes", which are like "doughnut fingers" that you eat with sugar or different sauces such as chocolate sauce.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Delicacies such as churros (Spanish doughnuts), freshly made sandwiches, speciality coffees and more.
Data.PageManchet: Savour freshly made churros (Spanish doughnuts), sandwiches, speciality coffees and more.
Data.PageText:
Churroria is decorated Spanish-style with seating where you can enjoy your drinks and churros.

Churros are also called "Spanish tubes", which are like "doughnut fingers" that you eat with sugar or different sauces such as chocolate sauce.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Churros, churros, churros. We make the dough ourselves and fry them fresh - they can be topped with ice cream or chocolate sauce. We also sell Tivoli lollipops, ice cream, candy floss and many other delicious things.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Small cosy ice cream and sweet shop.
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link text="" anchor="" linktype="internal" class="" title=""  querystring="" id="{42E6D8CA-23B0-40A7-97CF-1A1DAE0DF5EF}" />
Data.PageManchet: Small cosy ice cream and sweet shop.
Data.PageText: Follow the delicious scent of our warm churros. Enjoy them either with sugar or with ice cream. The shop also features a large selection of ice cream.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Elegant with an international touch.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Everyday luxury for those who crave indulgence
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{5730A4BA-400B-433E-91D3-F03E688897BA}" querystring="" text="Read more" anchor="" title="" class="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Creme by Nimb" linktype="internal" />
Data.PageText: Crème by Nimb is an urban gem in vibrant Copenhagen. Interiors are elegant with an international touch, while the service is informal and welcoming. The menu offers seductive temptations from Nimb’s versatile cuisine, including a discerning selection of sweet and savoury dishes. Crème by Nimb is for those with a craving for indulgence.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Donut worry. Be happy!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Dunk your donut!
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{FF152979-CCD6-4424-B56C-8D81AE7322A1}" querystring="" text="" anchor="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/The Donut Factory" title="" class="" linktype="internal" />
Data.PageManchet: Donut worry. Be happy!
Data.PageText:
Hungry for a classic donut - but with a great new twist? Look forward to our brand new shop in Tivoli with tempting donuts, colorful icing and delicious toppings. There's always something new and exciting to enjoy when you make your way past The Donut Factory.

Donut worry. Be happy!

Data.IntroductionDescription: Hot burgers & hot dogs!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Organic hot dogs with just the garnish you want.
Data.PageManchet: The perfect combo!
Data.PageText: Try our signature hamburger "THE SCREAMNING DEMON" with habanëro ketchup..

Data.IntroductionDescription: High quality coffee, freshly baked bread and delicious salads.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Only the best coffee is good enough for our guests.
Data.PageManchet: We offer take-away!
Data.PageText:
Espresso House is the leading Scandinavian coffee chain. Only the best coffee is good enough for our guests, and every bean that goes through the grinder and our barista's savvy hands are specialty coffees that belong among world's best. The shop also feautures a large selection of food, teas and ice-cold refreshments.

Weekly opening hours: 07.30-18.00

Data.IntroductionDescription: Our focus is on freshly caught, sustainable seafood from the surrounding seas.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: For everyone who appreciates good food in cozy and relaxed surroundings.
Data.PageManchet: Our focus is on freshly caught, sustainable seafood from the surrounding seas.
Data.PageText:
Welcome to Figaro – Fiske & skaldyrsbistro and Figaro's Bar, Tivoli Gardens new fish restaurant with our focus on freshly caught, sustainable seafood from the surrounding seas. In addition to seafood, which will be the focal point of the house, there will also be available alternatives for those guests who prefer something other than fish.

In Figaro's Bar, it will be possible to take a break from the vibrant amusement park with a bar menu that offers good draft beers or organic wines, as well as a selection of different bar snacks.

The decor in both bistro and bar will be classic and timeless with warm colors and old, historic Tivoli posters. Figaro – Fiske & skaldyrsbistro is for everyone who appreciates good food in cozy and relaxed surroundings. As the founder of Tivoli Gardens, Georg Carstensen once argued before opening Tivoli in 1843: "When people have fun, they do not politicize."

Data.IntroductionDescription: Færgekroen's lunch consists of a top quality Danish open sandwich, where everything is home-made. In the evening, classic Danish dishes are served, spiced with inspiration from international cuisine.
Data.PageManchet: Classic Danish dishes
Data.PageText:
Lunch consists of a top quality Danish open sandwich, where everything is home-made. In the dusky evenings, when a light mist covers the lake, the restaurant serves classic Danish dishes spiced with inspiration from international cuisine. The dishes are adapted to the local home-brewed beer.

Visit the bar before or after dinner and follow the activities going on in the brewery. Several days a week, the restaurant's house pianist plays classic songs so diners later in the evening can sing along, which is a great experience.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Fish and Chips serves freshly caught fish and delicious, organic fries. The fish is dipped in home-made batter with thyme and panko flour to make it extra crispy.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Freshly caught fish and organic French fries.
Data.PageManchet: Freshly caught fish and organic French fries.
Data.PageText:
We serve our Fish and Chips with homemade organic tartar sauce, lemon and our characteristic spiced salt. You can even choose which vinegar you want, if your meal is to be enjoyed in accordance with original English traditions. 

Different varieties of organic beer, juice and mineral water are also available. 

Special conditions: We are a certified organic eatery with 60-90 % organic products.

MENU

Data.IntroductionDescription: The best ingredients for every season.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Outdoor seating in pleasant surroundings.
Data.PageManchet: A new family concept with the best ingredients and four signature dishes that change every season.
Data.PageText:
Garden Deli is situated in a lovely garden area near the Tivoli Lake. We serve food and beverages for the whole family. Our food is fresh, simple and tasty with an emphasis on organic and sustainable produce with a handful of good offers each season.

We offer barista coffee, spumante, rosé, organic juice and cold beer on draught and we serve ice cream for the sweet tooth. Enjoy your meal in our green surroundings with voliere and bird chirping or warm yourself by the fireplace in our greenhouse.  

MENU

Data.IntroductionDescription: Open face sandwiches lavishly topped with love.
Data.PageManchet: Open face sandwiches lavishly topped with love.
Data.PageText: Fru Nimb is a classic Danish open-face sandwich restaurant, lavishly topped with love; a love of good ingredients and a love of good experiences. Wherever possible, we use local produce, we always choose the best each season can offer with an authentic focus on organic fair. Try the tasteful open-face sandwiches and dinner classics.

Data.IntroductionDescription: French fries, buns, cheese, vegetables and the meat patty are all organic!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Try one of their world famous, simple but authentic burgers.
Data.IntroductionLinkExtra: <link text="" anchor="" linktype="internal" class="" title=""  querystring="" id="{886FAC13-BCCA-4EC5-9CB5-668534750F29}" />
Data.PageText:
The US-inspired hamburger chain Gasoline Grill has found its way to Tivoli Gardens. Try one of their world famous, simple but authentic burgers.

Opening hours: Sunday-Thursday: 11:30-22:00, Friday-Saturday: 11:30-23:30.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Green dining for all the senses.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Seasonal cuisine fresh from the field and fresh from nature.
Data.PageManchet: Green dining for all the senses.
Data.PageText: At Gemyse, organic greens and produce takes centre stage to offer plenty of taste and texture. Here, even the smallest shoot is treated with great passion. Restaurant Gemyse is open every day from 12 and offers a tasty vegetable-focused menu. We treat the culinary produce with the utmost respect to preserve its texture, taste and character.

Data.IntroductionDescription: GrÃ¸ften is the place where children can get egg and tomato sandwiches or a children's menu, while adults can enjoy freshly peeled shrimps.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Enjoy quality Danish lunch menus and much more.
Data.PageManchet: Enjoy quality Danish lunch menus and much more.
Data.PageText:
Grøften is one of Tivoli's oldest and most traditional restaurants, with a history that goes back to 1874, when the restaurant was called the Theatre Café. A visit to Restaurant Grøften is associated with great service and fine traditions, which we will do our best to honor. 

With red-checked tablecloths and fairy lights, the restaurant has a nostalgic holiday home atmosphere and also holds many special memories of childhood visits to Tivoli.

Grøften serves sandwiches and hot food for lunch and dinner seven days a week. It's a good idea to book a table either by phone or e-mail.

Special conditions: We offer gluten free bread.

Special conditionss: We offer sugar free dessert.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Italian fast food from Italia - La Vecchia Signora
Data.PageManchet: Delicious paninis and more..
Data.PageText:
Taste the famous stone-oven pizzas, delicious paninis and all the drinks served straight from the door to take with you on the go.

Benvenuti!

Data.IntroductionDescription: Isbjerget is an ice cream shop with great ice creams, candy floss and other sweets .
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Isbjerget is the place to go for soft ice, candyfloss and popcorn.
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{442B496D-137D-4DB8-AD1B-6B7832FD9015}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Isbjerget" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: Isbjerget is the place to go for soft ice, candyfloss and popcorn.
Data.PageText:
Isbjerget is an ice cream shop with great ice creams, candy floss and other sweets. 

PULS menu: Nachos with cheese topping and salsa and a medium soft drink.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Visit this little shop with ice cream made from Italian recipes and Danish ingredients. Decorate your ice cream at the sprinkle-buffet or enjoy a nice cup of coffee.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: The best Italian recipes
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{F7444C6E-5109-42EA-AAA4-777DB654E141}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Ismejeriet" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: The best Italian ice cream recipes..
Data.PageText: Visit this little shop with ice cream made from Italian recipes and Danish ingredients. Decorate your ice cream at the sprinkle-buffet or enjoy a nice cup of coffee.

Data.IntroductionDescription: At Joe & The Juice you can buy home-made sandwiches, fresh fruit or choose among the many delicious combinations of freshly squeezed juice.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: The popular juice and coffee concept in Tivoli.
Data.PageManchet: The popular juice and coffee concept in Tivoli.
Data.PageText:
At Joe & the Juice, you can get freshly squeezed juices, freshly home-made sandwiches and milkshakes with all kinds of fresh fruit. Here the staff take your order and prepare your fresh juice according to recipes developed using knowledge of the vitamins and minerals in fruits and vegetables and their great experience with the composition of the best flavour combinations.

The many juices have eye-catching names like Iron Man, Pick Me Up, Stress Down and many more. If you're hungry, you can also get delicious sandwiches, available either with vegetarian fillings or meat.

Special conditions: We offer gluten free bread.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Delicious tacos made with soft Mexican tortillas. All at reasonable prices!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: A small menu with delicious food.
Data.PageManchet: Kaktus is closed.
Data.PageText:
A cantina is a Mexican inspired café, bar and eatery. Kaktus is Tivoli’s cantina. At Kaktus we offer street tacos, snacks, cold and hot beverages and organic cocktails.

All this can be enjoyed on our sunny terrace with a view of the Tivoli Lake or inside during cooler weather.   

Kaktus is closed.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Homemade Danish liquorice from Bornholm.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Homemade Danish liquorice from Bornholm.
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{F548C172-3C71-4321-B7DE-664F86653186}" querystring="" url="/TivoliV2/Mad og drikke/Spisesteder/Lakrids" linktype="internal" target="" />
Data.PageManchet: A world of liquorice.
Data.PageText: Homemade Danish liquorice from Bornholm.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Italia - La Vecchia Signora is the little sister of La Vecchia Signora on GrÃ¸nnegade in Copenhagen. At Italia you can expect good Italian food and delicious pizzas.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Enjoy home-made pizza from the stone oven and delicious Italian dishes.
Data.PageManchet: Enjoy home-made pizza from the stone oven and delicious Italian dishes.
Data.PageText: At Italia, you can expect good Italian food and delicious pizzas baked in a stone oven according to an authentic Italian recipe. The menu features classic and contemporary appetizers, main courses and desserts from Italy.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Mazzolis, a Italian restaurant in Copenhagen’s Tivoli Gardens with a positive, friendly approach to the dining experience, serving honest food with rustic simplicity. Mazzolis serves flavoursome Italian classics – from antipasto to pizza and steakhouse menus.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Honest food and rustic simplicity.
Data.PageManchet: Honest food and rustic simplicity.
Data.PageText:
Mazzoli’s in Tivoli is an Italian restaurant with a positive, friendly approach to the dining experience, serving honest food with rustic simplicity.

Mazzoli’s serves flavoursome Italian classics – from antipasto to pizza and steakhouse menus. The restaurant offers a contemporary urban take on the Italian family eatery in an easygoing yet stylish Milan-inspired pavilion setting. Between lunch and dinner and in the hours before Tivoli’s closing time, the restaurant also doubles as a grand café, offering gelato, barista coffees and the quintessential cocktail favourites of the bel paese.

Mazzoli’s offers glutenfree pizza and glutenfree pasta. 

Menu

Data.IntroductionDescription: French temptations morning, noon and evening.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: European brasserie classics with a modern, playful twist.
Data.PageManchet: French temptations morning, noon and evening.
Data.PageText:
Nimb Brasserie stands for unspoiled taste and relaxed quality. Rustic and intimate, with French classics where you will feel at ease. Enjoy breakfast, brunch, lunch and dinner with a breathtaking view of Tivoli.

The brasserie is one of Denmark's largest and can accommodate 250 guests. The room is divided into different sections, so diners can sit together cosily. Sit with views of Tivoli and enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner.

Serving from 8.00 to 22.00, Nimb Brasserie embraces the whole day and puts you at the centre of culinary quality where you are spoilt for choice and get personalised service with a homely spirit.

The restaurant is open all year round.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Cocktails, bubbles & afternoon tea where the sky is the limit.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Cocktails, bubbles & afternoon tea where the sky is the limit.
Data.PageManchet: Cocktails, bubbles & afternoon tea where the sky is the limit.
Data.PageText: A magical atmosphere and perfectly balanced cocktails in the city's most exclusive hotel bar, under the old ballroom's crystal chandeliers. Drink, dream and return the next day for the adventurous Afternoon Tea.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Shawarma and falafel made â€‹â€‹from a traditional, original recipe.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Delicious, home made kebabs.
Data.PageManchet: Original Shawarma is the place to go for original, Middle Eastern food.
Data.PageText: Our shawarma is made from the traditional original recipe. It consists of 100% flank steak giving a delicious, grilled flavor. Don't  forget our falafel, made from chickpeas from an original Lebanese recipe.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Delicious, freshly made hamburgers and American-style food.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: American â€œcomfort-foodâ€.
Data.PageManchet: American â€œcomfort-foodâ€.
Data.PageText:
American-style Diner in Tivoli.

The emphasis is on American "comfort -food " with sumptuos burgers, French fries, fried chicken, milkshakes, ice cream sundaes and classic sandwiches and much more. 

Our ground meat is from prime Danish beef cattle, our sausages are homemade from our personal recipe and our cheese is the best Danish quality. 

We are more than pleased to welcome our guests to a place where the whole family can meet and enjoy a delicious and fun meal.

lunch MENU evening MENU

Data.IntroductionDescription: Visit Paafuglen to enjoy a traditional Danish lunch or dinner. The beautiful, light rooms also feature the original mirror paintings of the beloved characters from the Pantomime Theatre.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Popular restaurant with classic Danish dishes.
Data.PageManchet: Popular restaurant with classic Danish dishes.
Data.PageText:
If you want to enjoy an authentic Danish lunch or dinner, you should eat at Paafuglen. The beautiful, light rooms also feature the original mirror paintings of the beloved characters from the Pantomime Theatre.

If you want to throw a party, you can do it in style at Paafuglen. The restaurant hosts both large and small parties (from 10 to 400 people) and also has delicious festive menus at reasonable prices.

BOOK table  lunch dinner events  wine list

Data.IntroductionDescription: Choose from savoury or sweet pancakes at Rasmus Klump's Pandekagehus. Our savoury pancakes are made from rye batter, so they contain more fibre. Our sweet pancakes are delicious, regular pancakes!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Rasmus Klump's very own favourite pancakes.
Data.PageManchet: Rasmus Klump's very own favourite pancakes.
Data.PageText:
Our pancakes are made with organic flour, milk, eggs and lots of love. The savoury pancakes reflect Rasmus Klump’s joy of travelling, so you can choose from Italian, Nordic, Mexican or middle eastern flavours. The sweet pancakes are served in many varieties from the classic with jam to raspberry/white chocolate, salty caramel or one of the other may tempting pancakes.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Nimb Vinotek offers rustic simmer dishes for under DKK 100, and a wine list filled with everyday wines at good prices. We look forward to welcoming you in the basement of Nimb.

Data.PageText:
Please note: Nimb Vinotek is no longer functioning as a wine bar and restaurant, but you can still host private functions in the spectacular room. Please don't hesitate to contact us on event@nimb.dk or +45 8870 0000.

The warm rustic ambiances with classic designer seating and wooden long tables are inviting places to host receptions and private functions. Guests always enjoy the dedicated service of the sommeliers, who are happy to share their knowledge on the origins of the wines and myriad nuances of their bouquets.

And naturally, Nimb Vinotek hosts wine tasting events in its classic wine cellar ambiances.

Data.IntroductionDescription:
Have you been going Corona Crrrrr-azy ? 
 - Tell me about it  !
Data.PageManchet:
Have you been going Corona Crrrrr-azy ? 
 - Tell me about it  !
Data.PageText:
â€œTELL ME ABOUT ITâ€  is the title of Crazy Christmas 2021 ! 
 
After cancelling last yearâ€™s Crazy Christmas show because of the Lock Down, and following 4 turbulent years of Trump and Brexit, McKee & Co have for our 40 years theatre season jubilee decided to take you back to a happier decade - The Eighties !
 
From 1980 to 1989, there was an explosion of colourful clothes, big hair, big shoulders, disco, drugs, and terrific TV shows: Miami Vice, Dynasty, Dallas. Dazzling pop idols, Michael Jackson, Madonna, Bowie, Abba and Elton, and the world was led by a movie star US president, a UK Iron Lady and a Glasnost Gorbachev. Reds hid under their beds, while ruthless mobsters made millions with organised crime. 
 
This is the story of Don Calzone and his family:  
Al Fresco, Dino, Dolce Vita and Cappuccino. They have been one of the most powerful Mafia families for decades, but now, in 1985, they are shocked to realise that times have changed.
Who will the Don choose to succeed him ? 
At a Calzone anniversary party at the Funky Flamingo in Miami Beach, all hell breaks loose when a drug lord known as The Cuban kidnaps the familyâ€™s advisor, a young millionaire businessman, Donald Dump, arrives to buy a property on Palm Beach, and Don Calzone is finally forced to make an offer that IS refused.  
 
Find out who makes it to the end of this eighties riotous gangster romp, created by Vivienne McKee with her signature cocktail of classic Crazy Christmas (now for its 38th time!) with a triple shot of Coppola, Tarantino and Scorsese, shaken and not stirred, with a slice of pure British silliness.
This is â€œNo Time to Die â€œ - but time to die laughing ! 
Enjoy this yearâ€™s best Tivoli roller-coaster ride, riddled with bullets, toe-tapping tunes, jokes, slapstick, satire, and best of all  - oodles of audience participation  !!   
 
ITâ€™S THE ONLY CRAZY WAY TO ENJOY CHRISTMAS ! 
 
Playing in Glassalen, Tivoli  
16. NOV 2021 - 15. JAN 2022

Data.PageText:
Father Christmas's grotto in the Pantomime Theatre is filled with the Christmas spirit. Father Christmas has sharpened his pencil and prepared his list â€“ so come and tell him what you want for Christmas.

He might give you the latest news from the elves' workshop in Greenland, invite you to dance a polka, or give you a tip about wrapping Christmas gifts. One thing is certain: He will be delighted to greet all his guests, both young and old. Welcome, one and all!

You can even have this yearâ€™s Christmas picture taken with Father Christmas if you like.
One Christmas photo: DKK 60
Two Christmas photos â€“ same scene: DKK 99
We kindly ask our visitors not to take their own photographs in Santa's grotto.

Father Christmas and Tivoli wish everyone a very merry Christmas!

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Tivoli entrance not included but included in unlimited ride ticket Plus
Data.IntroductionDescription: Come and enjoy our world beneath the surface
Data.PageManchet: Come and enjoy our world beneath the surface
Data.PageText:
See the beautiful coral reef fish, sharks and moray eels being fed, while our guides tell you about this wonderful world.
We will start by feeding the fish, and afterwards the staff will be available for questions.

The aquarium may be closed certain days due to events in the aquarium lounge.

A visit to the aquarium will cost 30 DKK and is not included in the regular unlimited ride ticket.
However, if you upgrade the unlimited ride ticket to an unlimited ride ticket plus, you can also experience the beautiful aquarium, allowing you to re-enter as many times as you like.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.PageText:
Go for a walk down the romantic and funny photolane, enjoy the christmas carrols and make sure you catch the perfect motive tor the christmas card this year.
The Photolane is for everyone and it is for free.
Enjoy!

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: Spectacularly spooky shadow play
Data.PageManchet: Spectacularly spooky shadow play
Data.PageText:
Under the mountain in Tivoli live a motley assortment of strange animals and shadowy creatures.
At Halloween, they all come out, and their haunting shadows can be seen dancing across the mountain.
Do you dare to watch?

The shadows will show from sunset till Tivoli closes.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: Spectacular projection show on Nimb's iconic faÃ§ade
Data.PageManchet: Spectacular projection show on Nimb's iconic faÃ§ade
Data.PageText: Experience the spectacular projection show every day at 16.30 until Tivoli closes at Nimbâ€™s iconic faÃ§ade. The show illustrates a watchmaker, baker, hairdresser and electrician who is decoration a Christmas tree in a small village.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionHeadline: The Tivoli Christmas tree is lit
Data.IntroductionDescription: Experience the lighting of Tivoli's Christmas tree
Data.PageTitle: The Tivoli Christmas tree is lit
Data.PageManchet: Experience the lighting of Tivoli's Christmas tree
Data.PageText:
Watching the lighting of Tivoli's Christmas tree on Friday 19 November will be a wonderful experience.

With a backdrop of thousands of Christmas lights, the aroma of pine and Danish Christmas cookies and a visit from Father Christmas himself, the scene is set for a festive day for all the family.

Accompanied by the Tivoli Youth Guard Band and the talented young actors from the Fairytale Theatre, Father Christmas will switch on the Tivoli Christmas tree lights at 16:30.

Tivoliâ€™s gigantic Christmas tree is located between the Tivoli Concert Hall and The Open Air Stage.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: Gigantic pumpkin art
Data.PageManchet: Gigantic pumpkin art
Data.PageText:
Watch up close as artist Malik Mabe from 11 a.m. skilfully carves impressive motifs in specially selected giant pumpkins.

When darkness falls, the giant Jack o'Lanterns will be lit up, creating the perfect enchantingly eerie Halloween atmosphere in Tivoli.

In the following days, the Jack o'Lanterns will be displayed in front of the The Nimb Water Fountains.

In collaboration with, Husqvarna.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: A Christmas tradition
Data.PageManchet: A Christmas tradition
Data.PageText:
When darkness falls over the Gardens you can enjoy the evocative Lucia Parade, which passes through the Gardens at 17:30 on Monday 13 December.

Tivoli has a long tradition of candles in the Gardens, and the Lucia Parade complements our tradition beautifully. The choir is made up of a hundred girls from the following choirs: Frederiksberg Sogns Pigekor, Vesterbro Sogns Ungdomskor, NordsjÃ¦llands Ungdomskor, HillerÃ¸d Kirkes Pigekor og BrÃ¸nshÃ¸j Kirkes Pigekor.

The parade starts and finishes from the Tivoli Castle, giving Tivoliâ€™s visitors a chance to enjoy the beautiful Santa Lucia song and other atmospheric Christmas tunes.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.PageTitle: Meet and Greet with Rasmus Klump

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: Amazing fireworks from the roof top of the Concert Hall
Data.PageManchet: Amazing fireworks from the roof top of the Concert Hall
Data.PageText: With the Fireworks Festival Tivoli wishes everyone a happy new year.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: Experience the Tivoli Illuminations transform the Tivoli Lake to a fantastic colourful universe of light, water, fire and smoke
Data.PageManchet: Whan darkness falls the Tivoli Lake is transformed in to a fantastic colourful univ
Data.PageText:
Every evening, the Tivoli Lake is transformed into the backdrop for the incredible Halloween Illuminations with lasers, fire, smoke and water - set to music composed by Jeppe Kaas.

At Tivoli, lighting has always been a feature. In the illuminations show, lighting is featured in its own right.

Halloween Illuminations are best seen from the bridge across the Tivoli Lake or in the area in front of Vertigo. Duration: approximately 8 minutes.

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionHeadline: The Tivoli Youth Guard's Christmas parade
Data.IntroductionDescription: Listen to Christmas carols and marches
Data.PageTitle: The Tivoli Youth Guard's Christmas parade
Data.PageManchet: Listen to Christmas carols and marches
Data.PageText:
Enjoy the impressive sight of the Tivoli Youth Guard marching through the Gardens while playing Christmas carols and Danish and English marches.
The parade takes place at 13:00 and 15:00 on Saturdays from 27 November until 18 December, starting and finishing at the Tivoli Castle.

The 90 members of the Tivoli Youth Guard aged 9-16 all attend the Tivoli Youth Guard music school every day. At the weekends they march around in their bright red uniform jackets and bearskin hats, entertaining visitors to the Gardens.

See more

Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionHeadline: The Tivoli Youth Guard's Christmas Copenhagen parade
Data.IntroductionDescription: Come and watch the Tivoli Youth Guard parade through the city
Data.PageTitle: The Tivoli Youth Guard's Christmas Copenhagen parade
Data.PageManchet: Come and watch the Tivoli Youth Guard parade through the city
Data.PageText:
On special occasions, the Tivoli Youth Guard marches through the streets of Copenhagen â€“ and they will do so on Saturday 20 November to celebrate the opening of Christmas in Tivoli.
The parade will begin at Kongens Nytorv at 14:00 and will continue along StrÃ¸get and City Hall Square (RÃ¥dhuspladsen), and then enter Tivoli through the main entrance at around 14:20.

The 90 members of the Tivoli Youth Guard are all aged 9-16 and they all attend the Tivoli Youth Guard music school every day. At the weekends they march around in their bright red uniform jackets and bearskin hats, entertaining visitors to the Gardens.

See more

Data.Programme:
Every night at 19:30, 20:30 and 21:30
Friday and Saturday also 22:30 
(There  is no Illumination show 31st December at 21.30 due to Firework Show)
Data.EventPrice1Comment: Included in the admission fee to Tivoli
Data.IntroductionDescription: Every night the Tivoli Lake lights up
Data.PageManchet: Every night the Tivoli Lake lights up
Data.PageText:
A Christmas treat for the whole family.
Light, sound, laser, fire, smoke and water unite in this Illumination show inspired by The Nutcracker â€“ with Tchaikovskyâ€™s music as the golden thread.

Tivoli Illuminations are best seen from the bridge across the Tivoli Lake or the area in front of Vertigo.
Duration approximately 10 minutes.

Please note that the show might be cancelled due to cold weather.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Keep your belongings safe and sound while you enjoy your visit to Tivoli.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Read more about hiring locker boxes here
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link id="{3F354097-035E-4F38-8C6D-1B6D7F826BBE}" querystring="" target="" text="" anchor="" title="" class="" url="/TivoliV2/Haven og forlystelser/Kort/Service/Bagagebokse" linktype="internal" />
Data.PageManchet: Keep your belongings safe during your visit to the park.
Data.PageText:
Locker boxes are available at the Main Entrance, the Glyptotek Exit and under the Demon. Usage of a small / large locker is 30 / 50 DKK.

Please note: Payment is possible with Danish coins or 50 / 100 DKK notes as well as creditcards.

Following measurements apply:

Large: H: 59 cm. W: 44 cm. D: 75 cm.

Small: H: 44 cm. W: 32 cm. D: 50 cm.

Data.IntroductionDescription: The BanegÃ¥rd entrance is located opposite Copenhagen's central train station. It's easy and convenient!
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Read more about the different entrances to Tivoli here.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Should you have an accident, you'll always feel safe with help from Tivoli's trained nurses.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: Read more about first aid at Tivoli here.
Data.PageManchet: Nurses station
Data.PageText:
Our Nurses station is manned during weekends, during the summer high season and during  the Halloween and Christmas seasons. We are staffed by trained nurses and found right next to the Glyptotek exit.

If you need assistance, please contact Tivoli's staff or call +45 33 15 10 01.

Data.IntroductionDescription: Have a refund after you finish your drink. Our automats are spread around the Gardens.
Data.IntroductionDescriptionSecondary: More information about our refundable cup-automats
Data.IntroductionLinkAlternative: <link querystring="" target="" linktype="internal" id="{143437C3-7859-4985-B398-41B33FADE477}" url="/TivoliV2/Haven og forlystelser/Kort/Service/Genbrugsbaegre 1" />
Data.PageManchet: Refund your cup
Data.PageText:
As part of improving the environment in Tivoli we strive to reduce the amount of disposable packaging. Therefore we serve our beverages in reusable cups in Tivoli stalls.

5 DKK is added to the cost of the beverage and this amount is refunded when the cup is processed at one of our automats.
