D. Tivoli Pass Membership terms and conditions

When purchasing a Tivoli Pass, the following terms and conditions are regarded as being accepted. For this reason, please read the terms and conditions thoroughly before buying your Tivoli Pass.

1) General Tivoli Pass terms and conditions

1. All Tivoli Passes entitle the Passholder to free admission to Tivoli for Tivoli's at any time open seasons. Tivoli's open seasons may vary and may be adjusted on an ongoing basis, but the cardholder is guaranteed a minimum of 200 opening days per calendar year.

2. A Tivoli Pass can either be purchased as a

  • subscription with annual payment
  • subscription with monthly payment, or as a
  • gift with an expiry date

3. There are the following types of Tivoli Passes:

  • Tivoli Pass: The Tivoli Pass provides admission for the Passholder. The Pass is strictly personal and is not valid for use by anyone but the Passholder.
  • Tivoli Silver Pass: The Tivoli Silver Pass entitles the Passholder to bring one companion free of charge per day. This is only valid when visiting with the Passholder, and it is a condition that the companion is a business associate, family member, colleague or friend of the Passholder.
  • Tivoli Gold Pass: The Tivoli Gold Pass entitles the Passholder to bring up to four companions together free of charge per day. This is only valid when visiting with the Passholder, and it is a condition that the companions are business associates, family members, colleagues or friends of the Passholder.
  • Tivoli Wild Pass: The Tivoli Wild Pass provides admission for the Passholder personally as well as a free Multi-ride ticket for the Passholder on each visit to Tivoli (max. one per day). The Multi-ride ticket is personal to you and must not be sold on. Infringement of this is considered misuse of the Tivoli Pass.

4. Tivoli Passes are purchased as digital products. Physical Tivoli Passes are available for purchase in return for a fee. 

5. All types of Tivoli Passes are strictly personal and may only be used by the Passholder. It is the responsibility of the Passholder that the Tivoli Pass is not misused. If the Tivoli Pass is used by someone other than the Passholder, this will be regarded as misuse of the Tivoli Pass, and the Tivoli Pass will be cancelled. Misuse of a Tivoli Pass may result in legal proceedings, as Tivoli reserves the right to claim compensation for damage sustained in connection with the misuse. The Tivoli Pass will not be returned after cancellation, nor will the fee for the Tivoli Pass be refunded in full or in part.

6. If the Passholder has purchased a Tivoli Pass, it is the Passholder's responsibility to complete the Tivoli Pass via the link to the Passholder's My Tivoli (Mit Tivoli)-profile, which is sent to the Passholder in connection with the purchase. The Passholder can also complete the Tivoli Pass in person at the Tivoli Box Office. Read more about the completion procedure in points 2.9 and 3.5.

7. Free admission applies only for Tivoli's at any time open seasons on presentation of a valid Tivoli Pass. Tivoli Passholders who are unable to present their Tivoli Pass must pay the normal admission fee, which is non-refundable. Likewise, Tivoli Wild Passholders who have forgotten their Pass must pay the full price for a Multi-ride ticket.

8. Tivoli Passholders who lose their Tivoli Passes must immediately contact Tivoli's Call Centre on tel. +45 33 15 10 01 or write to tivolikort@tivoli.dk, after which the Tivoli Pass will be blocked. If the Tivoli Pass is used by another person without it having been blocked, this is regarded as misuse and the Pass will be cancelled. Cancelled Tivoli Passes will not be returned and no refund will be given. A lost or damaged Pass can be replaced upon payment of a fee.

9. Tivoli reserves the right to cancel a Tivoli Pass without notice if Tivoli deems that the Passholder has acted deceitfully or improperly in or towards Tivoli or displayed unacceptable behaviour towards other visitors, employees or equipment in Tivoli, or has not complied with the Garden's Regulations in force at any given time in Tivoli or instructions from staff in Tivoli.

10. Tivoli reserves the right to restrict the Passholder's access to Tivoli on certain days or at certain times. This will be necessary for safety reasons, for example, or when limited access to Tivoli is required due to events inside or outside Tivoli. The Passholder will not be entitled to any compensation or refund in that connection, unless the access restriction/closure entails less than 200 opening days in the calendar year in question.

11. In the event of official prohibitions or recommendations, which mean that Tivoli must be kept closed or access to Tivoli must be restricted, for example due to extraordinary health or safety considerations or similar, the cardholder does not obtain the right to compensation or reimbursement of any other kind in this connection, unless the restriction/closure entails less than 200 opening days in the calendar year in question.

12. All Tivoli Passes can be purchased online via Tivoli.dk or in person at the Tivoli Box Office, Tivoli Service Centre and at Tivoli's entrances.

13. Questions regarding Tivoli Passes should be addressed in writing or by telephone to: Tivoli Call Centre, Vesterbrogade 3, Postboks 233, DK-1630 Copenhagen V., tel. +45 33 15 10 01 and e-mail tivolikort@tivoli.dk.

 

2) Tivoli Passes purchased as subscriptions

1. Tivoli Passes purchased as subscriptions are taken out as ongoing subscriptions, calculated and paid for either for one year (annual payment) or one month (monthly payment) at a time.

2. A Pass purchased with annual payment is valid for the month in which it is purchased and the 11 subsequent months. The first month is paid for in full regardless of the date of purchase.

3. A Pass purchased with monthly payment is valid for the full month in which the Pass was purchased. The full month is paid for regardless of the purchase date.

4. The validity period for a Tivoli Pass purchased as a subscription begins immediately, as soon as the Pass is issued. This also applies even though the Tivoli Pass is purchased in a period when Tivoli is closed.

5. An agreement on the purchase of a Tivoli Pass as a subscription can be entered into only by persons who are over the age of 18 and legally competent.

6. Tivoli Passes with annual payment can be purchased at the Tivoli Box Office and Tivoli.dk. Here, the purchaser will be informed of the current Membership terms and conditions, which the purchaser must accept. The Pass can be completed at the Box Office and online via Tivoli.dk. Tivoli Passes purchased at physical sales points may only be paid for one year ahead.

7. Tivoli Passes with monthly payment may only be purchased online via Tivoli.dk

8. You can purchase a Tivoli Pass as a subscription for other people. The payment obligation will be linked to you as the Administrator.

9. Tivoli reserves the right to charge a set-up fee.

10. Completion

  1. If the Passholder is not the same person as the Tivoli Pass Administrator (the person liable for making payment), a link will be sent to the Passholder. The link contains instructions for completing the Tivoli Pass on My Tivoli. The Administrator will receive an e-mail with a link to My Tivoli, where the remaining credit card information is to be filled in.
  2. The Passholder completes the Tivoli Pass by creating a profile on My Tivoli. The Passholder must, in this connection, create a password and upload a picture of the Passholder. The picture of the Passholder will be stored with a view to admission control. When the Passholder visits Tivoli, the photo is displayed on a screen visible to attendants at the entrance. The Passholder must show proof of identity on request. While use of the Tivoli Pass is not contingent upon Tivoli collecting and keeping a portrait photo of the Passholder, Passholders who do not wish to have a photo registered are always obliged to produce photographic identification at the entrance to Tivoli. The Passholder's name may be changed in person at the Box Office provided the Passholder's name is correspondingly changed in the Danish National register (Folkeregistret). The Passholder's photo can be changed if Tivoli deems that the Passholder's appearance has significantly changed. The Passholder must also register his or her payment information for use with ongoing payment. The Passholder may, at any time, unconditionally withdraw his or her consent to the ongoing payments made from the registered payment account. However, the Passholder’s obligation to pay will continue, unless the Subscription is terminated in accordance with the conditions in section 12.
  3. The physical Pass can be made electronic at a later date if the Passholder adds the Pass to Tivoli's app. The Tivoli Pass can also be printed out.

11. Payment

  1. If the Tivoli Pass is purchased with monthly payment, the payment for the first calendar month in which the Tivoli Pass is valid must be made at the time of purchase. Payment may only be made online in connection with the purchase at Tivoli.dk. Payment for the following calendar month will fall due on the first of the following dates: 1) between the 22nd and 26th day of the current month, 2) the last day of the current month or 3) the first day of the following month. 
     
    Example 1: A Tivoli Pass is purchased with monthly payment on the 1st of June with 1st of June as the starting date. Payment for the month of June shall be made at the time of purchase. Payment for the month of June will fall due between the 22nd and the 26th day of June the same year.
     
    Example 2: A Tivoli Pass is purchased with monthly payment on the 27th of August with 27th of August as the starting date. Payment for the month of August shall be made at the time of purchase. Payment for the month of September will fall due on the 31st of August the same year – 4 days after the date of purchase.
     
    Example 3: A Tivoli Pass is purchased with monthly payment on the 27th of August with 1st of September as the starting date. Payment for the month of September shall be made at the time of purchase. Payment for the month of October will fall due between the 22nd and the 26th of September the same year.
     
  2. For Tivoli Passes purchased with annual payment, payment must be made for 12 months at the time the Tivoli Pass is issued.
  3. The subscription can be paid with a payment card, credit card or Mobilepay.
  4. When payment for a new period is deducted, the Passholder and Administrator are notified (the latter only if the Passholder and Administrator are not the same person) via My Tivoli.
  5. If the ongoing payment for the Subscription is not made at the agreed time, a reminder will be sent to the Administrator of the Tivoli Pass via the contact information supplied. A reminder fee of DKK 100 may be added in accordance with the Danish Interest Act (renteloven). The Pass will be blocked until valid payment data are received and payment has been made. The delay is considered significant if payment has not been made within 3 months of the due date, and Tivoli can then decide to cancel the Passholder's subscription agreement.
  6. Current prices and fees are always posted on Tivoli's website www.tivoli.dk/priser.
  7. Notification on price changes will be sent by e-mail to the e-mail address provided at least 45 days before the price change comes into force. Read more about the amended terms and conditions in point 2.12.
  8. If the Passholder has had a valid Tivoli Pass purchased as a subscription within the past 12 months, Tivoli reserves the right to charge a set-up fee if the Passholder once again wishes to purchase a Tivoli Pass.

12. Termination

  1. A Tivoli pass purchased as a subscription may be cancelled by the passholder subject to the minimum subscription period of 5 months from the subscription’s start date by giving one month's notice to expire at the end of a month. If a subscription is cancelled, the Tivoli pass will not be renewed.
  2. Tivoli Passes purchased as subscriptions must be actively terminated and cannot be suspended.
  3. A subscription may only be terminated in writing via My Tivoli or e-mail to Tivoli's Call Centre, tivolikort@tivoli.dk.
  4. Failure to pay is not considered termination.
  5. The Tivoli Pass Administrator may terminate the Subscription for the Passholder if payment is the responsibility of the Administrator.
  6. If a Tivoli Pass purchased as a subscription with annual payment is terminated before the validity period expires, the amount due after the time of termination is refunded. The amount is refunded in person at the Box Office or if written notification is submitted to Tivoli's Call Centre via tivolikort@tivoli.dk. The amount will be refunded to an account number or credit card. The calculation is based on the price for monthly payment valid at any time i.e. the payment for the months before the time of the termination are calculated as if the agreement signed had been made for a subscription paid for monthly.
  7. Tivoli reserves the right to adjust prices during the commitment period. Read more about this in point 2.13.
  8. The receipt for termination will be sent by e-mail to the Tivoli Passholder and Administrator (the latter only if the Passholder and Administrator are not the same person).

13. Amended terms and conditions

  1. Tivoli reserves the right to adjust prices during the period of subscription. Price adjustments may be due to increases in the consumer price index over the past year. Price changes can also be made if they are a result of increased expenses for Tivoli, e.g. in connection with increased expenses associated with Tivoli's operations, including costs to suppliers, costs related to meeting new requirements from authorities or legislation, meeting current inflation, and as a result of expansions or changes in Tivoli's terms and conditions for the respective Tivoli Passes. Price changes can also only be made according to the following criteria;

    - Price adjustment can take place a maximum of once a year and with a maximum annual increase of 10 %.
    - The changes will be notified individually
    - The agreement may be terminated as a result of the change.

  2. If the Tivoli Pass is purchased as a subscription with monthly payment, the Administrator may, in the case of price adjustments, terminate the Subscription Agreement, including during the period of commitment. If the Administrator has purchased a physical Tivoli Pass, the cost of this will be refunded.

  3. Notification on significant amendments to Tivoli's Membership terms and conditions, including price adjustments, will be posted on Tivoli's website www.tivoli.dk and notified individually by e-mail to the e-mail address provided at least 45 days before the price change comes into force.

14. Right of cancellation

  1. A Tivoli pass purchased as a subscription may be cancelled by the passholder within 14 days from the day of the purchase. A Tivoli pass with postponed start date may be cancelled by the passholder until the start date, but no less than 14 days from the day of the purchase. The right of cancellation will lapse, if the Tivoli pass is used, including if the passholder uses the Tivoli pass as entrance card to Tivoli.

15. Tivoli Lux

  1. Tivoli Lux is a benefit programme that provides access to a range of personal benefits in Tivoli. In order to gain access to the benefits offered in the benefit programme, Tivoli Lux, the passholder must:

    and

    b) have downloaded the Danish version of the Tivoli app and have a My Tivoli-profile on which your Tivoli Pass on subscription* is registered.

Please note that several of these card types are not for public sale, but are issued to cardholders by Tivoli.

2. A Tivoli Pass purchased as a gift is valid for 12 months from the month chosen by the buyer for it to become valid. This applies even if the Tivoli Pass is completed at a later date, and even if Tivoli is closed during the purchase period.

3. A Tivoli Pass without registered payment information expires after the prepaid period of 12 months and is therefore not a subscription. The Passholder may convert or renew the Tivoli Pass so that the Tivoli Pass has the nature of an ongoing subscription with either annual or monthly payment.

4. Passes purchased as gifts and as BTB sales are valid from the set start month and the following 11 calendar months after which they expire, unless a subscription is registered before the expiry date.

5. Completion

  1. Tivoli Passes purchased as gifts must be completed via Tivoli's app, Tivoli.dk or in person at the Box Office. A Tivoli Pass is complete when the Passholder has added his or her name and a personal portrait photo to the Pass.

6. Payment

  1. Tivoli Passes may be purchased with a payment card, credit card or MobilePay. Tivoli Passes may also be purchased with cash.
  2. When paying for a Tivoli Pass as a gift, the buyer pays in advance for the entire agreement period, i.e. 12 calendar months.
  3. Current prices are always posted on Tivoli's website, see www.tivoli.dk/priser.

7. Amended terms and conditions

  1. Notification on significant amendments to Tivoli's Membership terms and conditions will be posted on Tivoli's website www.tivoli.dk and notified the subscribers by e-mail to the e-mail address provided at least 45 days before the change comes into force.

8. Right of cancellation

  1. Tivoli Passes purchased as gifts may be refunded within 14 days in person at the Box Office or in writing to Tivoli's Call Centre at tivolikort@tivoli.dk. This applies only to Tivoli Passes purchased by private individuals (B2C).

9. Retention of ownership

4) Marketing and newsletter

H. Gift certificate

1. Gift certificates are valid for three years after purchase.

2. Gift certificates can be redeemed at Tivoli's entrances and at most restaurants and other shops inside the Gardens. A list of places where gift certificates can be used is available here: www.tivoligardens.com/en/praktisk/gavekort.

3. It is possible to return a gift card in the valid period for a fee of DKK 50.

4. In case of repayment during the period from the expiry of the gift card and up to a year later, the fee will lapse.

5. After four years from the date of purchase, the possibility of repayment lapses.

6. Complaints and queries: Tivoli Box Office, Vesterbrogade 3, 1630 Copenhagen V, +45 3315 1001, or info@tivoli.dk
You can also make your complaint to us using the online dispute resolution platform, http://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/, provided by the European Commission.

We process your personal information in line with our Personal data policy. You will find our Personal data policy here.


I. Ride photos 

When purchasing ride photos, you do not have the right of cancellation if you consent to the fulfillment of the agreement commencing before the expiry of the cancellation deadline, and you acknowledge that you will thereby lose your right of cancellation.

This is how we use your information

To give you the best Tivoli experience, we save certain information such as your name, e-mail address and date of birth. The information is used by Tivoli to guide and inform you of activities and offers in the Gardens, and we make sure that we never pass on this information.

We will send you information via e-mail regarding activities in Tivoli and offers on our own products, such as Multi-ride tickets, events, concerts, and admission tickets.

You will only be contacted directly by Tivoli, never by our collaboration partners, and we do not pass on your e-mail address to any of these partners. However, from time to time we may send you relevant offers from our sponsors and collaboration partners. These are:

Labels.ShopPersonalDataUsage:
As a natural part of Tivoli's marketing and other activities, Tivoli processes data regarding our members and visitors. Tivoli's policy for this processing is to be transparent. This policy therefore describes how Tivoli processes the personal data that Tivoli collects in connection with our activities, including via our website.

The controller

Tivoli A/S, CVR no. 10404916, Vesterbrogade 3, 1630 Copenhagen, Denmark, is the controller responsible for the collection and processing of personal data described in this policy.

Collection of personal data

Tivoli collects, stores and processes data on names, addresses, photos, email addresses, telephone numbers and dates of birth for Tivoli Pass members, along with data regarding these members' preferred use of the Gardens and their activities, and use of the Tivoli Pass payment function. In addition, Tivoli records data about our members' visits to the Gardens in the current season for the purpose of categorising them and to prevent any misuse of Tivoli Passes.

Tivoli uses the data to give Tivoli Pass members the best possible information about Tivoli's activities and offers and to tailor the Gardens and any offers to our members and other visitors.

When tickets are purchased for events in the Tivoli Concert Hall and the Glass Hall Theatre, Tivoli collects, stores and processes data on names, addresses, e-mail addresses, telephone numbers and e-mail permissions.

In connection with providing data, it will always be clear whether your consent is voluntary or necessary for performing the desired action, e.g. making a purchase in our online shop.

The data are primarily collected directly from you, but we may also receive data from other sources, including independent booking and ticketing service providers.

Why does Tivoli process your data?

Tivoli processes personal data about you for the following purposes:

- To complete orders in the online shop:
When you shop in Tivoli's online shop, we ask for your e-mail address so we can send you a receipt for your purchase. Credit card details are processed in accordance with applicable PCI – DSS standards.

- Tivoli Pass:
When you buy a Tivoli Pass membership, Tivoli collects a range of personal data about you.

When issuing a Tivoli Pass, Tivoli takes a portrait photo of the pass holder. The photo will only be used by Tivoli for admission control and will be stored in a database. When the Tivoli Pass holder visits the Gardens, the photo may be displayed on a screen that is visible only to the ticket collector at the entrance. Pass holders who do not wish to have a photo registered are always obliged to produce photographic identification at the entrance to Tivoli. A note may be added to their personal data indicating that they wish to use photographic identification.

- Marketing and newsletters:
If you have consented to this, Tivoli will process your personal data in order to send e-mails and newsletters from Tivoli containing relevant membership benefits and offers, information on events and discounts in Tivoli, and offers and benefits that are available from Tivoli's partners. Tivoli collaborates with businesses within the tourism, automotive, clothing, drinks, hotel and energy industries. You can always see a list of Tivoli's current partners at www.tivoligardens.com/en/erhverv/sponsorer. It will always be Tivoli that sends out the offers on behalf of our partners. If you no longer wish to receive these e-mails and newsletters, you can unsubscribe by e-mailing tivolikort@tivoli.dk or by pressing the "Unsubscribe from Tivoli Tæt På" button at the bottom of the newsletter.

When using the Tivoli app, you consent to Tivoli sending you push notifications through the request that appears when the app first opens. The notifications will contain information about your Tivoli card, your memberships and other relevant information about Tivoli. You can always change this in the settings of your smartphone. 

Tivoli reserves the right to carry out mail merging of data for people living at the same address. This means that if all members of a family have Tivoli Passes, for example, we do not send four letters (one to Mum, one to Dad and one to each of the children); instead the household receives just one letter containing all the information.

Please note that personal data are only processed for the transmission of marketing materials if you have explicitly consented to this in advance, unless the law allows for us to contact you without your consent. Where this is the case, our basis for processing your personal data will be Tivoli's legitimate interest in marketing.

- Surveillance:
Tivoli performs video surveillance in parts of the Gardens. Video surveillance is performed for the purpose of prevention of criminal activity and to ensure the safety of our visitors in the Gardens. Tivoli has erected signs by the areas with video surveillance.

Recordings will only be accessed and viewed in the event of suspected criminal activity or in connection with internal and external checks. Similarly, recordings may be reviewed in order to clarify safety-related incidents.

In the event of criminal activity or suspected criminal activity, the recordings may be passed to the police. Disclosure may also occur if this is required by law.

- Customer service and communication:
When you contact Tivoli's customer service or communicate with us in any other context, we collect and process the data you provide in order to process your enquiries. We encourage you not to disclose sensitive data to us unless this is strictly necessary to the processing of your enquiry. If you are sending the data via e-mail, they should only be sent in encrypted form.

- Use of the website:
Tivoli has access to data on visitors to Tivoli's website and the visitor's use of the website and its features.
 When you have visited Tivoli's website, we collect the following data about you:
• The pages you visited on Tivoli.dk, including when and for how long
• The browser type
• IP address 

The data collected are processed on the basis of Tivoli's legitimate interest in learning about how users use our website. This information is used to improve the website. We also use data about all our users' navigation to understand how our users as a group use the website and, against this background, try to make the website better. We cannot see where you come from or move on to on the internet when you leave our site. We also collect information about the products that our users, as a group, prefer. This information is also used to improve the website.

- Rides in the Gardens:
Some rides in the Gardens collect personal data about you when you use them, such as photographs and usage. You will be informed of the scope and purpose of data processed in regard to each individual ride.

- Other purposes
In addition to the above purposes, Tivoli may also process your personal data in order to fulfil legislative requirements or to establish, assert or protect legal claims.

With whom does Tivoli share your personal data?

Tivoli does not disclose your personal data to third parties without your consent, unless such disclosure is necessary to the fulfilment of an agreement to which you are a party, for example, agreements with partners in connection with the Tivoli Pass. In certain circumstances, and in accordance with legislation, it may be necessary to disclose personal data to public authorities or to the police. For example, data may be passed to the police in the event of suspected credit card fraud.

In some circumstances, Tivoli will share your personal data with Tivoli's suppliers who deliver services on behalf of Tivoli, e.g. in connection with the distribution of newsletters. These suppliers only process the personal data on behalf of Tivoli and in accordance with Tivoli's instructions. They cannot therefore process personal data for their own purposes.

Cookies

Tivoli uses cookies on its website and in apps. These may collect personal data. Our use of cookies and processing of personal data in connection with this are described in further detail in our cookie policy, which is available here.

Revoking consent

You are entitled to revoke any consent that you may have granted Tivoli at any time. We will then delete the personal data, unless we are able to continue processing them on some other legitimate basis. However, revocation of consent may mean we are no longer able to offer you the same products and services.

Consent for our newsletter can be revoked via the unsubscribe link in each communication.

Your rights

You are entitled to know what data Tivoli processes about you and the purpose of processing the data. You are also entitled to object to your personal data being processed, including for profiling, and to request rectification, or erasure of data that are incorrect, misleading or have otherwise been processed in contravention of the relevant legislation, or to request that the processing be restricted.

In certain cases, you are entitled to receive the personal data that Tivoli controls in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format, and to transmit those data to another controller. You also have the right to object to your personal data being processed with a view to direct marketing. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact:

Tivoli A/S 
Vesterbrogade 3
DK-1630 Copenhagen V
E-mail: comments@tivoli.dk
Telephone: +4533151001

Security

Tivoli emphasises that all personal data are treated confidentially, and that the data are only processed by employees who have received instructions on how to process personal data in order to prevent the data from being destroyed or falling into the hands of unauthorised persons.

Storage of personal data

Tivoli will update the stored data as required to ensure that the personal data are correct at all times.

Membership ceases when the pass expires. When a membership expires, the member's personal data will be suspended. The member's personal data will be deleted 24 months after expiry of the membership, unless the Tivoli Pass is renewed or replaced by a new Tivoli Pass.

Recordings from video surveillance for the purpose of preventing criminal activity are deleted or anonymised no later than 30 days after the recording is made, unless it is necessary for Tivoli to store the recordings in order to process a specific dispute, e.g. in connection with the clarification of criminal activity or other illegal activities. Recordings from video surveillance for other purposes will be deleted when storage of the data no longer serves a substantive purpose.

The data may also be stored for longer in anonymised form, i.e. it will no longer be possible to link the data to you.

Links to other websites, etc. 

Our website may contain links to other websites or to integrated websites. We are not responsible for the content of other companies' websites or their practices with regard to the collection of personal data. When you visit other websites, we encourage you to read the owners' policies in regard to personal data protection and other relevant policies.

Contact

If you have questions about or wish to complain about the processing of personal data, you can always contact Tivoli by e-mail or telephone, as described above. You may also contact the Danish Data Protection Agency, Borgergade 28, 5., 1300 Copenhagen K, Denmark.

Last updated on 28 May 2020

Labels.MembershipTermsAndConditions:
1. Guests with an annual card for Tivoli are members of the Tivoli Annual Card scheme.

2. All cards give free admission to Tivoli from the age of 8 years of age for the summer, for Halloween and for Christmas in Tivoli for the cardholder.

There are the following types of annual card:

- Annual Card: Admission for the cardholder. The card is strictly personal and is not valid for use by anyone but the cardholder.

- Wild Card: In addition to admission, the cardholder is entitled to receive a free Multi-ride ticket on each visit to Tivoli (only one per day). The Multi-ride ticket is personal to you and must not be sold on. Infringement of this is regarded as misuse of membership.

- Silver Card and Shareholder’s Card: In addition to admission, the cardholder has the option of bringing one companion free of charge per day. This is only valid when visiting with the cardholder, and it is a condition that the companion is a business associate, family member, colleague or friend of the cardholder.

- Gold and VIP Card: In addition to admission, the cardholder has the option of bringing up to four companions free of charge per day. This is only valid when visiting with the cardholder, and it is a condition that the companions are business associates, colleagues, family members or friends of the cardholder.

3. All types of annual card are strictly personal and only for use by the cardholder. The cardholder is responsible for ensuring that the annual card is not used improperly.

If the annual card is used by someone other than the cardholder, this will be regarded as misuse, and the annual card will be cancelled and membership will stop. Misuse of an annual card may result in legal proceedings, as Tivoli reserves the right to claim compensation for damage sustained in connection with the misuse. The annual card will not be returned after cancellation, and you will receive neither a full nor a partial membership refund. 

4. If the cardholder has purchased an annual card which must be activated, it is the responsibility of the cardholder to activate the annual card via www.tivoli.dk, as indicated in the accompanying instructions. An annual card which is not activated will not provide admission to Tivoli and cannot be refunded or transferred to the next year.

5. All types of Tivoli Passes are strictly personal and may only be used by the Passholder. It is the responsibility of the Passholder that the Tivoli Pass is not misused. If the Tivoli Pass is used by someone other than the Passholder, this will be regarded as misuse of the Tivoli Pass, and the Tivoli Pass will be cancelled. Misuse of a Tivoli Pass may result in legal proceedings, as Tivoli reserves the right to claim compensation for damage sustained in connection with the misuse. The Tivoli Pass will not be returned after cancellation, nor will the fee for the Tivoli Pass be refunded in full or in part.

6. In connection with use of an annual card, Tivoli takes a portrait photo of the cardholder which is saved for the purposes of admission control. When visiting Tivoli this photo will be displayed on a screen visible to the attendant at the entrance. The cardholder must produce valid identification if asked to do so. Cardholders who do not wish to have a photo registered must always produce picture identification at the entrance to Tivoli. 

7. Free admission to Tivoli can only be obtained upon production of a valid annual card, likewise member benefits and discounts can only be obtained upon presentation of a valid annual card. If a cardholder has not brought a valid annual card with him, the cardholder must pay the normal entrance charge, which will not be refunded. In the case of a forgotten Wild Card, the cardholder must likewise pay the full price of a Multi-ride ticket.

8. If the cardholder loses his annual card, Tivoli Annual Card administration must be contacted immediately on +45 70 15 06 66, after which the annual card will be blocked. If the annual card is used by another person without it having been blocked, this is regarded as misuse and the card will be cancelled. Cancelled annual cards will not be returned and no refund will be given. A lost or damaged card can only be replaced upon payment of a fee equalling a normal entrance fee.

9. Tivoli reserves the right to cancel an annual card without notice if the cardholder has acted deceitfully or improperly in or towards Tivoli, or has displayed unacceptable behaviour towards other guests, employees or equipment at Tivoli, or has not complied with the Garden's Regulations in force at any given time at Tivoli or instructions from staff at Tivoli.

10. Membership of the Tivoli Annual Card and the annual card purchased are valid from the time of purchase/time of activation until the end of the calendar year in which the card was purchased. Membership comes to an end automatically afterwards unless renewed. An annual card purchased after Halloween will also be valid for the subsequent calendar year. 

11. Membership is binding and cannot be terminated or refunded during the period of validity. If two memberships have been issued in the same name, one membership can be refunded during the period of validity if the annual card has not already been used. Membership cannot be transferred to another person, although membership can be transferred in the case of a member's death upon payment of a fee equalling a normal entrance charge. Gift and commercial memberships are not refunded. If the annual card is unused, the gift membership can be transferred to another name within a week of it being received. If a new annual card has to be issued, payable for this is a fee equalling a normal entrance fee. An annual card sponsored by Tivoli can be upgraded upon payment of the price difference between the listed prices. Shareholder, press and other special cards cannot be altered.

12. Tivoli reserves the right to change the terms and conditions of membership without notice, including restricting the cardholder's access to Tivoli on certain days and at certain times. Changed terms and conditions of membership will be published on www.tivoli.dk/aarskort and cardholders who have registered with the service will also be notified by email.

12a. Tivoli reserves the right to restrict the cardholder's access to Tivoli on certain days or at certain times. This will be necessary for safety reasons, for example, or when limited access to Tivoli is required due to events inside or outside Tivoli. The cardholder will not be entitled to any compensation or refund in that connection. 

13. Questions regarding the Tivoli Annual Card scheme should be addressed in writing or by telephone to: Tivoli Annual Card administration, Vesterbrogade 3, Postboks 233, 1630 Copenhagen V., tel. +45 70 15 06 66 and email aarskort@tivoli.dk.

14. The card must be signed before use, and by signing the cardholder accepts the conditions above.

 

How Tivoli processes personal information

A. We process personal information about our members and guests as a natural part of Tivoli's activities and marketing by Tivoli. It is Tivoli's policy to be open about how we process such information.

B. Tivoli collects, stores and processes information regarding names, addresses, photos, email addresses, telephone numbers, dates of birth and email permissions for Tivoli Season Pass members, along with information regarding these members’ preferred use of the Gardens and their activities, and use of the Season Pass payment function.

C. Tivoli also registers information regarding holders' visits to the Gardens during the current season for the purpose of classification into categories and to guard against any misuse of the annual cards. 

D. The information is used by Tivoli to give holders of the Tivoli annual cards the best possible information regarding activities and offers in the Gardens and to customise the Gardens and its offers to the members and their other guests.

E. In connection with use of an annual card, Tivoli takes a portrait photo of the cardholder. The photo, which will be used by Tivoli for the sole purpose of admission control, will be kept in a database. When visiting the Gardens the photo can be shown on a screen which is only visible to attendants at the entrance. Cardholders who do not wish to have a photo registered must always show picture identification when entering Tivoli and it can be noted in their personal data that they wish to use picture identification.

F. Tivoli attaches importance to the fact that all personal identification is kept confidential, and that the information can only be processed by employees who have received training in how personal information is to be processed to avoid the information being deleted or it getting into the wrong hands.

G. By purchasing a Tivoli Season Pass, you agree to receive emails and newsletters containing relevant membership benefits and offers, information on events and discounts at Tivoli, and offers and benefits from Tivoli's partners etc. Tivoli collaborates primarily with businesses within the fields of amusements, the restaurant industry, transport, financing, clothing and the entertainment industry. Members can view a list of Tivoli's partners at any time by visiting www.tivoli.dk/aarskort. It will always be Tivoli that sends out the offers on behalf of our partners. Members who do not wish to receive these emails and newsletters can unsubscribe by emailing aarskort@tivoli.dk or by pressing the “Unsubscribe me from Tivoli News” (“Afmeld Tivoli Nyt”) link at the bottom of the newsletter. The email address can also be used if you wish to unsubscribe from emails and newsletters when your membership ends, or at a later date.

H. Tivoli reserves the right to carry out mail merging of data for people who live at the same address. This means that if everyone in a family has a Season Pass, instead of receiving four letters (for example), one to the mother, one to the father and one to each of the children, they will receive one letter which contains all the information.

I. Tivoli guarantees that it updates as necessary the stored information so that the personal information is not kept for longer than necessary. When a membership is cancelled, all the relevant information for the member in question will be suspended. The member's personal information will be deleted a maximum of 18 months after membership stopped.

J. Members of the Tivoli Annual Card scheme are entitled to see what information Tivoli processes about them, and for what purpose the information is processed. Cardholders are also entitled to object to the information being processed and have the right to request rectification, deletion or blocking of information which is incorrect, misleading or in a similar way is being processed in contravention of the law. Members who wish to make use of these rights can contact Tivoli A/S, Vesterbrogade 3, 1630 Copenhagen V.

Data.MonthlyProductDescription:
A Tivoli Pass is for those of you who want free entry to all Tivoli seasons. You can come as many times as you like - and have hours of good experiences, music and wondrous entertainment. With the subscription you can also be granted access to the bonus programme Tivoli Lux* which is full of special treats and discounts inside the Gardens.

You get:

  • Free entrance for you - also to Friday Rock concerts
  • Benefits with Tivoli Lux*
  • Bring along two children aged 3 - 7
  • 15% discount on parking at APCOA near Tivoli

If you visit Tivoli more than three times during the open seasons you can benefit from buying a Tivoli Pass.

You can bring along up to two children age 3-7 with your Tivoli Pass, while all children under the age of 3 enjoys free entrance to the Gardens.

*Â Please note, Tivoli Lux is only available in the Danish version of the Tivoli app.

Worth knowing

You can decide for yourself whether you want to pay the subscription on a yearly or monthly basis. For yearly payments, it will be DKK 350 and for monthly payments it will be DKK 40 per month (totaling DKK 480 per year)*.

Your Tivoli Pass is digitally available in My Tivoli.

Your Tivoli Pass is personal and cannot be used by others.

Read the subscriptionâ€™s terms and conditions here.

Data.MonthlyProductDescription:
Tivoli Silver Pass is for those of you who want free entrance to Tivoli - together with, for example, a friend, partner or colleague. Come as often as you like and get hours of good experiences, music and wondrous entertainment. With the subscription you can also be granted access to the bonus programme Tivoli Lux* which is full of special treats and discounts inside the Gardens.

You get:

  1. Free entrance for you and one companion - also to Friday Rock concerts
  2. Benefits with Tivoli Lux
  3. Bring along two children aged 3 - 7
  4. 15% discount on parking at APCOA near Tivoli

Your Tivoli Silver Pass is personal and cannot be used by others. However, you can bring along a different person each time if you like. And this applies to all of Tivoliâ€™s seasons.

You can bring along up to two children aged 3-7 with a Tivoli Silver Pass, while all children under the age of 3 gain free entrance.Â 

*Â Please note, Tivoli Lux is only available in the Danish version of the Tivoli app.

Worth knowing

You can decide for yourself whether you want to pay the subscription on a yearly or monthly basis. For yearly payments, it will be DKK 729 and for monthly payments it will be DKK 80 per month (totaling DKK 960 per year)*.

Your Tivoli Silver Pass is digitally available in My Tivoli.

Your Tivoli Silver Pass is personal and cannot be used by others.

Physical passes are sent with PostNord. Expected delivery time is 7 - 10 weekdays. It is possible to use the digital version of the pass until the physical pass is received by post. The digital pass requires the owner to have a My Tivoli profile.

Read the subscriptionâ€™s terms and conditions here.

*Please be aware that the prices will change for Tivoli Passes with monthly payment from 1 May 2022. The price for monthly payment will be DKK 85 pr. month pr. Tivoli Pass.

Data.MonthlyProductDescription:
A Tivoli Wild Pass is for those of you who are adventurous - and who want both a Ride Ticket for all the rides and free entrance throughout all of Tivoliâ€™s four seasons. Come as often as you like and feel the rush from the fun, wild and familiar rides. With the subscription you can also be granted access to the bonus programme Tivoli Lux* which is full of special treats and discounts inside the Gardens.

You get:

  1. Free entrance for you - also to Friday Rock concerts
  2. An Unltd. Ride Ticket included with each visit
  3. Benefits with Tivoli Lux
  4. Bring along two children aged 3 - 7
  5. 15% discount on parking at APCOA near Tivoli

With a Tivoli Wild Pass, you can enjoy the entertainment, music and the wondrous environment during all of Tivoli's open seasons.

You will be issued a personal Unlimited ride Ticket each time you visit Tivoli (one per day). Unlimited ride Ticket does not include selected seasonal rides.

In addition, you can bring along up to two children aged 3-7, while all children under the age of 3 gain free entrance. The children that accompany you will not have the Ride Ticket included, however.Â 

*Â Please note, Tivoli Lux is only available in the Danish version of the Tivoli app.

Worth knowing

You can decide for yourself whether you want to pay the subscription on a yearly or monthly basis. For yearly payments, it will be DKK 999 and for monthly payments it will be DKK 105 per month (totaling DKK 1260 per year)*.

Your Tivoli Wild Pass is digitally available in My Tivoli.

Your Tivoli Wild Pass is personal and cannot be used by others.

Physical passes are sent with PostNord. Expected delivery time is 7 - 10 weekdays. It is possible to use the digital version of the pass until the physical pass is received by post. The digital pass requires the owner to have a My Tivoli profile.

Read the subscriptionâ€™s terms and conditions here.

*Please be aware that the prices will change for Tivoli Wild Passes with monthly payment from 1 May 2022. The price for monthly payment will be DKK 115 pr. month pr. Tivoli Wild Pass.

Data.MonthlyProductDescription:
Tivoli Gold Pass is for those who - together with up to four companions per day - want free entrance to Tivoli. Come as often as you like and bring along friends, family, colleagues or business contacts - and have hours of good experiences, music and wondrous entertainment. With the subscription you can also be granted access to the bonus programme Tivoli Lux* which is full of special treats and discounts inside the Gardens.

You get:

  1. Free entrance for you and four companions - With VIP-entrance to Friday Rock concerts
  2. Benefits with Tivoli Lux
  3. Bring along four children aged 3 - 7
  4. 50% discount on parking at APCOA near Tivoli
  5. 25 DKK discount on up to five Unltd. Ride Tickets per day in 2021

Your Tivoli Gold Pass is personal and cannot be used by others. Your up to four companions, on the other hand, can easily be different people each time, you just have to be sure to enter the Tivoli Gardens together and it is a condition that the companions are your business associates, colleagues, family or friends.

In addition, you can bring along up to four children aged 3-7, while all children under the age of 3 gain free entrance.

*Â Please note, Tivoli Lux is only available in the Danish version of the Tivoli app.

Worth knowing

You can decide for yourself whether you want to pay the subscription on a yearly or monthly basis. For yearly payments, it will be DKK 1.349 and for monthly payments it will be DKK 140 per month (totaling DKK 1.680 per year)*.

Your Tivoli Gold Pass is digitally available in My Tivoli.

Your Tivoli Gold Pass is personal and cannot be used by others.

Physical passes are sent with PostNord. Expected delivery time is 7 - 10 weekdays. It is possible to use the digital version of the pass until the physical pass is received by post. The digital pass requires the owner to have a My Tivoli profile.

Read the subscriptionâ€™s terms and conditions here.

*Please be aware that the prices will change for Tivoli Gold Passes with monthly payment from 1 May 2022. The price for monthly payment will be DKK 150 pr. month pr. Tivoli Gold Pass.

Data.Title: Packages
Data.Subtitle: A day in Tivoli at a good price

Data.Title: Rides
Data.Subtitle: All the rides - over and over

Data.TileSubtitle: Entrance and Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus in one package.
Data.ProductDescription:
This package is valid for one entrance and one Unlimited Ride Ticket Plus for one person on a chosen weekday during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021.

Unlimited ride ticket Plus is valid for all Tivoli's rides including: 

  • Villa Vendetta and The Haunted (min. 12 years)*
  • Unlimited Ride-photos on your mobile from**
    • The Roller Coaster
    • The Demon
    • The Flying Trunk
    • The Mine
    • The Vintage Cars
    • The Milky Way Express
  • Access to Tivoli's Aquarium***
  • One spin free spin on Hyggehjulet or Grand Prix

* Opens at 5PM all days.
** Digital Ride-photos requires a My Tivoli profile and that Tivoli's app is installed on your mobile phone. Read more.
*** The Aquarium may be closed on selected days.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The Best Offer package gives admission to one vist for one person during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021.

The ticket is scanned at Tivoli's entrances.
Your Unlimited ride wristband Plus is collected in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens. 

Please note that the tickets can be printed or it can be displayed directly from the mobile phone.

The ticket for weekdays (Monday to Friday) is not valid on Saturdays and Sundays. 

Children aged 3 to 7 must have a separate ticket. Children under 3 years of age enjoy free admission to Tivoli if accompanied by a paying adult. One adult can accompany a maximum of four children under 3 years of age. If there are more than four children per adult, the full admission price is paid for each child beyond the fourth child under 3 years of age.

The entrance ticket is not valid after 7.00PM on fridays with Fridays Rock concerts. On these Fridays after 7.00PM a special entrance ticket is needed.

NB! The tickets cannot be refunded or exchanged. If the ticket is used more than once, it will only work the first time it is scanned.

Data.TileSubtitle: Entrance, Unltd. Ride Ticket Plus, Ride photo, All Inclusive menu og much more...
Data.ProductDescription:
The All Inclusive package offers you a visit to Tivoli in one complete package. Once the package has been paid for, you are ready for a tour of Tivoli.

Package 8 years+:

  • Entrance to Tivoli
  • Unlimited Ride ticket Plus. 
    Includes:
    • Villa Vendetta and The Haunted (min. 12 years)*
    • Unlimited Ride Photos on your mobile**
    • Access to Tivoli's Aquarium***
    • One free spin on Hyggehjulet or Grand Prix
  • Ride photo or small balloon
  • Meal (fixed menu incl. 1 glass of fizzy drink/beer/wine)

Package (1-7 years):

  • Entrance to Tivoli
  • Unlimited Ride Ticket
  • Ride Photo or a small balloon
  • Access to Tivoli's Aquraium**
  • Meal (fixed children's menu - including dessert - incl. 1 glass of fizzy drink/water/juice)

Many of Tivoli's restaurants and eateries have put together a delicious adult's and children's menu which is included in the All Inclusive package. There is something for every taste, for both big and small!

See restaurants and eateries with All Inclusive menu's here

* Opens at 5PM all days.
** Digital Ride-photos requires a My Tivoli profile and that Tivoli's app is installed on your mobile phone. Read more.
*** The Aquarium may be closed on selected days.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The package is not valid 31 December 2021. 

The ticket must be scanned at the entrance.
To receive your Unlimited Ride wristband you must scan the ticket in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens.
Show the ticket at the eating place for redemption of your meal.

Please note that we are not responsible for meals being sold out or if the eateries are fully booked.

Data.TileSubtitle: Entrance, Unltd. Ride Ticket Plus and a meal.
Data.ProductDescription:
The PULS package is the fun package with a meal! Visit Tivoli, go on the rides, get something quick and easy to eat and drink - and save money!

The package contains:

  • Entrance to Tivoli
  • Unlimited Ride Ticket
  • Easyfood
  • Drink (excl. deposit)

Many of Tivoli's restaurants and eateries have put together a delicious PULS menu which is included in the package. There's something for every taste!

See restaurants and eateries with PULS easyfood menu here
Data.ProductInfoText:
The package is not valid 31 December 2021. 

The ticket must be scanned at the entrance.
To receive your Unlimited Ride wristband you must scan the ticket in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens.
Show the ticket at the eating place for redemption of your meal.

Villa Vendetta and The Haunted is not included in Unltd. Ride ticket. If you have an Unltd. Ride ticket and want to visit Villa Vendetta or The Haunted then you have to purchase Ride tickets in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens or Tivoli’s app.

Please note that we are not responsible for meals being sold out or if the eateries are fully booked.

Data.TileSubtitle: Entrance, Unltd. Ride Ticket Plus, soda with popcorn or candyfloss and an ice cream.
Data.ProductDescription:
With the Halloween package you get entrance to Tivoli, Unltd. Ride ticket Plus, 1 soda with popcorn or candyfloss and an ice cream.

The package contains:

  • Entrance to Tivoli
  • Unlimited Ride ticket Plus. 
    Includes:
    • Villa Vendetta and The Haunted (min. 12 years)*
    • Unlimited Ride Photos on your mobile**
    • Access to Tivoli's Aquarium***
    • One free spin on Hyggehjulet or Grand Prix
  • 1 small soda with a candyfloss or popcorn
  • 1 ice cream of the day "to-go"

* Opens at 5PM all days.
** Digital Ride-photos requires a My Tivoli profile and that Tivoli's app is installed on your mobile phone. Read more.
*** The Aquarium may be closed on selected days.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The package is valid on a day of your choice during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021.

Please note that the tickets can be printed or it can be displayed directly from the mobile phone.
 
The entrance ticket is scanned at Tivoli's entrance.
To receive your Unlimited Ride wristband you must scan the ticket in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens.
Redeem 1 little soda with a candyfloss or popcorn at Vaffelbageriet or Tivoligrillen.
Redeem ice cream of the day "to-go" at one of the following places: Churros, Garden Deli, Isbjerget, Ismejeriet, Sukkerskyen, Vaffelbageriet eller Viftens Ishus.

Children aged 3 to 7 must have a separate entrance ticket. Children under 3 years of age enjoy free admission to Tivoli if accompanied by a paying adult. One adult can accompany a maximum of four children under 3 years of age. If there are more than four children per adult, the full admission price is paid for each child beyond the fourth child under 3 years of age.

NB! The tickets cannot be refunded or exchanged. If the ticket is printed more than once, it will only work the first time it is scanned.

Data.TileSubtitle: Buy your entrance ticket here and skip the ticket queue.
Data.ProductDescription:
The ticket is valid for one visit during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021.

Skip the queue and buy your tickets here, so you can get in quicker and enjoy the Gardens.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The entrance ticket is valid for one guest in the valid period. The entrance ticket does not give access to Tivoli's rides. You must use one ticket per guest per visit.

Children aged 3 to 7 must have a separate entrance ticket. Children under 3 years of age enjoy free admission to Tivoli if accompanied by a paying adult. One adult can accompany a maximum of four children under 3 years of age. If there are more than four children per adult, the full admission price is paid for each child beyond the fourth child under 3 years of age.

Please note that the ticket can be printed or it can be displayed directly from the mobile phone.

The entrance ticket for Mondays to Fridays is not valid on Saturdays and Sundays.

On Fridays with Fridays Rock concerts a Friday Rock a special entrance ticket is needed after 7.00PM.

The 2-days tickets are valid for visits to Tivoli on two consecutive days during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021.

NB! The ticket is scanned at Tivoli's entrance. The ticket cannot be refunded or exchanged. If the ticket is printed more than once, it will only work the first time it is scanned.

Data.TileSubtitle: Valid for all rides including Villa Vendetta, Unlimited Ride Photos on your mobile, entrance to Tivoli's Aquarium and one free spin on Hyggehjulet or Grand Prix.
Data.ProductDescription:
Unlimited ride ticket Plus is valid for all Tivoli's rides including: 

  • Villa Vendetta and The Haunted (min. 12 years)*
  • Unlimited Ride-photos on your mobile from**
    • The Roller Coaster
    • The Demon
    • The Flying Trunk
    • The Mine
    • The Vintage Cars
    • The Milky Way Express
  • Access to Tivoli's Aquarium***
  • One spin free spin on Hyggehjulet or Grand Prix

* Opens at 5PM all days.
** Digital Ride-photos requires a My Tivoli profile and that Tivoli's app is installed on your mobile phone. Read more.
*** The Aquarium may be closed on selected days.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The ticket entitles you to one Unlimited Ride wristband Plus during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021. Entrance to Tivoli is not included.

Your Unlimited ride ticket is exchanged for an Unlimited Ride wristband Plus in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens.

The Aquarium may be closed on select days.

Children aged 0-1 year can go on rides without an Unlimited Ride ticket when they are accompanied by a paying person over the age of 14.

You must use one ticket per guest per visit. Please note that you must print the ticket or it can be scanned directly from the mobile phone. 

NB! The ticket cannot be refunded or exchanged. If the ticket is printed more than once, it will only work the first time it is scanned.

Data.ProductDescription:
Valid for all rides. 

Children aged 0-1 year can go on rides without an Unlimited Ride ticket when they are accompanied by a paying person over the age of 14.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The ticket entitles you to one Unlimited ride wristband during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021. Entrance to Tivoli is not included.

Your Unlimited ride ticket is exchanged for an Unlimited ride wristband in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens.

You must use one ticket per guest per visit. Please note that you must print the ticket or it can be scanned directly from the mobile phone.

Villa Vendetta and The Haunted is not included in Unltd. Ride ticket. If you have an Unltd. Ride ticket and want to visit Villa Vendetta or The Haunted then you have to purchase Ride tickets in the self-service kiosks in the Gardens or Tivoli’s app.

Data.TileSubtitle: Children aged 1-7 can take an adult over 14 years of age with them on the rides.
Data.ProductDescription:
With the Co-rider ticket the child (1-7 years) gets two wristband and can thus take different adults over the age of 14 on the rides alternately.

Children aged 0-1 year can go on rides without an Unlimited Ride ticket when they are accompanied by a paying person over the age of 14.
Data.ProductInfoText:
With Unlimited Ride ticket Co-rider you receive two tickets that are exchanged for two Unlimited ride wristbands in the self-service kiosks in the Garden. Both wristbands must be worn by the child. 

Valid during Tivoli's open seasons in 2021.
Entrance to Tivoli is not included.

With a Co-rider Ticket the child gets two wristbands on the arm and can take any person over 14 years of age with them on the rides. The child and co-rider must be seated together on the rides.

The Co-rider Ticket is only valid for children 1-7 years.

Data.ProductDescription:
Normal price 30 DKK at the entrance to the Aquarium.

Experience feeding time for the the brightly-coloured fish in the 30-metre long aquarium. Or see the cute little octopus open a glass jar with no problems. Tivoli's Aquarium is a true world of colours!
Data.ProductInfoText:
Please note that the Unlimited ride ticket does not give admission to Tivoli's Aquarium, but it is included in Unlimited ride ticket Plus.

Please note that the ticket must be shown at the entrance to the Aquarium. The ticket cannot be refunded or exchanged. The ticket will only work the first time it is used. 

Please note: Due to special arrangements the aquarium might be closed.

Data.ProductDescription:
Take a walk around the Gardens and taste some of Tivoli's many food concepts.

Food Tour in Tivoli can be purchased with and without entrance ticket to Tivoli.

WHAT YOU GET:
Lobster Shack in Tivoli Food Hall
1 mini lobster roll and 1 glass of Cava

Garden Deli
1 tartlet of the season and 1 glass of rosé wine

Biergarten
1 Bratwurst og 1 lille fadøl

Anarkist
Salted snacks and the choice between 1 Nohrlund cocktail or 1 beer (0,5l).

We reserve the right to make changes to the menu.
Please note that alcohol is not served to people under the age of 18.
Data.ProductInfoText:
The ticket can be redeemed on an optional day during Tivoli's open seasons 2021 from 5PM to 9PM.
The ticket is not valid on December 31st.

The ticket must be scanned at Tivoli's entrance.
Meals are handed out upon presentation of the ticket at the relevant restaurants.

Entrance and all meals must be enjoyed on the same day.

The ticket does not include access to Tivoli's rides.

Note that the ticket must be either printed or it can be presented directly from a mobile phone.
If the ticket is printed more than once, it will only work the first time it is scanned.

The ticket is not exchangeable or refundable.

Data.Description:
Upgrade your Single Ride to an Unltd. Ride ticket. 

Unltd. Ride ticket gives unlimited access to all of Tivoli's ride.

Access to Villa Vendetta is not included in Unltd. Ride ticket.

to Unltd. ride Ticket Plus (min. value 135 DKK). 

With Unlimited ride Ticket Plus you get:
- Free access to Villa Vendetta
- Unlimited Ride Photos on your mobile
- Access to Tivolis Aquarium
- One free spin on Hyggehjulet or Grand Prix
